citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 3:30 PM on
24-Aug-16. Inspector knocked on the front door of the licensees house. Inspector called telephone numbers given
by the licensee. Per phone conservation, licensee stated that they had a prior commitment and would not be
available to do a facility inspection.
* Copy of inspection report was sent by regular mail.

narrative:
2.126(b)
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 3:30 PM on
24-Aug-16. Inspector knocked on the front door of the licensees house.  Inspector called telephone numbers given
by the licensee.  Per phone conservation,  licensee stated that they had a prior commitment and would not be
available to do a facility inspection.
*   Copy of inspection report was sent by regular mail.
